title: Cryptolove20015
author: Cryptolove20015
created_time: March 07, 2023, 12:51:00 PMLast edit: April 06, 2023, 04:14:20 PM by Cryptolove20015
content: Website       Twitter       Telegram        Facebook         Telegram 1. The Bounty campaign will be managed by Bounty Cryptolove20015 2. (20k$ prop) tokens are to be divided according to the stakes accumulated amongst selected participants.3. The bounty program was launched on march 08-03-2023 and end April 04.-04-2023______________________Disclaimer: By agreeing to participate in this bounty, you acknowledge that the wallet address and the email address you submitted are final and can't be changed.Bounty Cryptolove20015 may perform additional reviews, including but not limited to requesting other documentation for analysis of your joined campaigns if needed. Bounty Cryptolove20015 is under no obligation to send your bounty reward and may, at its discretion, cancel your participation from each ongoing bounty if the participant does not follow the rules mentioned on this bounty thread. Bounty Cryptolove20015 has no contribution to the token distribution; unless it announces the exact opposite on group and channel. We are onlyresponsible for the reward distribution of any campaign when we publish it, unless explicitly stated "Bounty Cryptolove20015 has. guarantees the reward distribution of this bounty."The USD value of the bounty reward pool is estimated, and it might change regarding different factors. We usually announce the rewards by calculating their final token sale price if it is not listed on any exchange yet. Our team has carefully researched the project following several criteria as we did for all of the campaigns we have managed or published. However, we can't assure the project's success as our duty is to provide a bounty management service for them as freelancers. We areresponsible only for managing the campaign. We are not responsible for the project's success and continuity. A crypto project has too many factors in reaching their targets. We are not in the team of any project and not their employees, and we can't guarantee the future progress of any project only because we manage their bounty as freelancers. We encourage everyone to do their research and due diligence before investing their time or money. Participating in this bounty campaign or investing in it will be at your own risk.1. All participants must join prop token official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter Page.2. All participants must join Bounty Cryptolove20015  Telegram Group, Telegram Channel, Twitter.3. Talking about the bounty program in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign and an instant ban from the company chat group. Please ask your bounty-related questions in the Bounty Cryptolove20015 Group.4. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.5. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.6. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty program immediately and all your accounts will be banned permanently. Brand new accounts are not allowed to join.7. Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.11. All participants have to submit their weekly reports (for social campaigns) on this bounty thread. Stakes will be calculated on a weekly basis. For each week, you are required to make new reports. Edited reports and POA will not be counted                     Proof Of Registration Format (All participants must send 1 time):Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATION              Forum Username:              Forum Profile Link:              Telegram Username:              Participated Campaigns:              BSC Wallet Address:                            BOUNTY ALLOCATION                                          Twitter - 40%                                          Telegram - 30%                                          Facebook - 30%                            BOUNTY SCHEDULE                   * Please submit your weekly report on this bounty thread        Week List Week 1 (08.03 - 14.03)Week 2 (15.03 - 21.03)Week 3 (23.03 - 28.03)Week 4 (29.03 - 04.04) Rewards:1. Have more than 501 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1501 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5001 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,001 followers: 4 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow prop token Twitter Page.2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 501 followers.3. Participants have to make new tweets or retweet 5 tweets per week (maximum 1 retweets/day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 10 hours minimum.5. Participants must use hashtags #prop token #Crypto #Blockchain #BTC #Bitcoin                      -------Google Form----------- Stakes will be paid depending on friends/followers (at the start of the campaign).200-500 Followers/Friends: 1 stake per week500-1500 Followers/Friends: 2 stakes per week1500-3000 Followers/Friends: 4 stakes per week3000+ Followers/Friends: 5 stakes per weekParticipants must make minimum 5 shares per week, maximum 1 share per hour, 4 shares per day, and 12 shares per week.Rules:1.   You must join Telegram here : https://t.me/TheBlockPark2. Participants must share and like prop token posts.3. Participants must like and subscribe to prop token Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/BlockPark 4.   Shares must have a link to the prop token website and Telegram group5. Use hashtags: #prop token #Crypto #Blockchain #BTC #Bitcoin YOU MUST INCLUDE THESE IN YOUR posts/shares, otherwise they won't be counted.6.   Accounts with fake friends/followers will be disqualified7.   Friends/followers will NOT be updated after having registered in the campaign8.   All shared articles must also be liked9.   Please DO NOT post rubbish comments, it is neither necessary nor wanted.10.   If you have no new posts from our official Facebook account, kindly make a short post about prop token and use all of our official hashtag.11.   Your privacy settings must be set to public so that we can check your work.12.   You have to like as well as share our posts. Minimum 5 per week.                           -------Google Form--------                             Rewards:                                  5 stakes/week                     Rules:1. Update your Telegram name to Your Name | prop token  Ambassador.(Example:  | Cryptolove20015 Ambassador)2. Replace your profile picture with Narfex 3. Participants can only wear one project name at a time. Wearing more thanone project in your telegram name will disqualify you from the campaign.4. Your telegram username must be visible to all while in the community. You must interact with the Telegram account with which you have registered the campaign. Violation of this rule will lead to the removal of all earned stakes.5. Spam or Deleted messages will not be counted. Hashtags "#" are not allowed in the conversation.6. Report your telegram message links weekly. Please obey the report dates and format.7. You must stay in the telegram group until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.8. You must wear prop token avatar and text until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.                        ----------Google Form---------
